name: Dipoles-Cavity Interaction
short_description:
<Temporarily Unavailable Online>
This project is aiming at completing a library of open codes (mainly based on MATLAB at present) to deal with Dipoles-Cavity Interaction problems. Common methods, including Green's function method and Master Equation method et al, will be applied to the coding. Samples of calculations and standard comparison with publications using the library will be given for demonstration of the usage. Interface to some commonly used software, such as Lumerical FDTD Solutions, will also be developed in the project.

This project is titled under nanophotonics, quantum optics, nano-optics, computational physics and physics.
